eu.amidst.core.inference

Interface InferenceAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HuginInference, ImportanceSampling, MAPInference, MessagePassingAlgorithm, ParallelVMP, VMP

    public interface InferenceAlgorithm
    This interface handles and defines the algorithm used to run inference in BayesianNetwork models. For an example, eu.amidst.core.examples.inference.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • runInference

        void runInference()
        Runs inference.

      • setModel

        void setModel(BayesianNetwork model)
        Sets the model for this InferenceAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        model - a BayesianNetwork model to which this InferenceAlgorithm will be set.

      • getOriginalModel

        BayesianNetwork getOriginalModel()
        Returns the original model of this InferenceAlgorithm.
        Returns:
        a BayesianNetwork object that represents the original model of this InferenceAlgorithm.

      • setEvidence

        void setEvidence(Assignment assignment)
        Sets the evidence for this InferenceAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        assignment - an Assignment object to which the evidence will be set.

      • setParallelMode

        default void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode_)
        Sets the parallel mode for this InferenceAlgorithm. Note that this method is only implemented for the inference algorithms that can be run in parallel.
        Parameters:
        parallelMode_ - a boolean that indicates whether this InferenceAlgorithm can be run in parallel (i.e., true) or not (i.e., false).

      • getExpectedValue

        default double getExpectedValue(Variable var,
                                java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> function)
        Returns the expected value.
        Parameters:
        var - a Variable object.
        function - a Function object.
        Returns:
        a double that represents the expected value.

      • getPosterior

        <E extends UnivariateDistribution> E getPosterior(Variable var)
        Returns the posterior of a given Variable.
        Parameters:
        var - a Variable object.
        Returns:
        an UnivariateDistribution object.

      • getPosterior

        default <E extends UnivariateDistribution> E getPosterior(int varID)
        Returns the posterior of a given Variable.
        Parameters:
        varID - an int that represents the ID of a variable.
        Returns:
        an UnivariateDistribution object.

        Sets the seed.
